item.title: Blobby - The cutest habit tracker ever
item.description: Blobby is your cute buddy to help you develop healthy habits in the most important aspects of your life, with a strong focus on keeping balance. It uses the power of range-goals, lets you write a daily journal, and has a lot of great hairstyles for Blobby!

item.title: ReNett - A convenient place for group video messaging in communities
item.description: ReNett is a place for asynchronous group video messaging in communities. Think Reddit meets Snapchat. The new product includes a mobile app for video communication in communities ReNett and a video commentary plugin for websites ReCommentt.
item.content:encoded: ReNett is a place for asynchronous group video messaging in communities. Think Reddit meets Snapchat. The new product includes a mobile app for video communication in communities ReNett and a video commentary plugin for websites ReCommentt.

item.title: Urbanpinion - Citizens engagement platform to develop your city together
item.description: Citizens engagement platform that lets you create a landing page with an interactive map in just a few steps, launch a survey and collect citizens' ideas and votes - and make the right decisions for the city development.
item.content:encoded: Citizens engagement platform that lets you create a landing page with an interactive map in just a few steps, launch a survey and collect citizens' ideas and votes - and make the right decisions for the city development.

item.title: Navi - Transcription and live translation for FaceTime
item.description: Navi brings transcription and live translation to FaceTime through SharePlay. The app opens FaceTime up to people with hearing impairments and other disabilities that prevent them from engaging easily in a video call environment.
item.content:encoded: Navi brings transcription and live translation to FaceTime through SharePlay. The app opens FaceTime up to people with hearing impairments and other disabilities that prevent them from engaging easily in a video call environment.

item.content:encoded: Kitchenful is an app for personalized recommendations of recipes that also gets you the ingredients delivered from a local grocery store. They offer the same convenience as meal kits do, but with better personalization at a lower price point.

item.title: Flickcall - Watch together on your favorite streaming platforms
item.description: Flickcall is a privacy-focused browser extension to watch movies & TV shows together. Your personal chats & video stream are delivered directly to peers (without backend servers). Supports Netflix, Youtube, Primevideo, Hotstar, & Zee5.
item.content:encoded: Flickcall is a privacy-focused browser extension to watch movies & TV shows together. Your personal chats & video stream are delivered directly to peers (without backend servers). Supports Netflix, Youtube, Primevideo, Hotstar, & Zee5.

item.content:encoded: Otis House is a marketplace, auction platform, and vault for physical items, built on top of Ethereum. The physical items are stored, secured, and insured by Otis. We then mint an NFT for each item representing ownership of the asset.

item.title: Fugo TV Dashboards - Securely share business intelligence data on TV screens
item.description: Until now, there have been few ways to share critical data across whole organizations at scale. TV Dashboards let you replace unnecessary meetings, interruptions, emails & link sharing by putting your data up on your workplace TV screens for all to see.
item.content:encoded: Until now, there have been few ways to share critical data across whole organizations at scale. TV Dashboards let you replace unnecessary meetings, interruptions, emails & link sharing by putting your data up on your workplace TV screens for all to see.
